channel.title: Comments on: A hobbit’s cave fantasy

item.title: By: Kathryn Burrington
item.dc:creator: Kathryn Burrington
item.description: This does look like a wonderful place. Would love to visit one day but in the meantime I'll just enjoy your photos.
item.content:encoded: This does look like a wonderful place. Would love to visit one day but in the meantime I’ll just enjoy your photos.

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
Hi Samantha,
Thanks for your comment! Hezen is really an amazing hotel - it was one of our favourites of our whole trip to Turkey. I just wish we could have stayed longer! You're right - it is really a magical place.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Samantha,

Thanks for your comment! Hezen is really an amazing hotel – it was one of our favourites of our whole trip to Turkey. I just wish we could have stayed longer! You’re right – it is really a magical place.

item.title: By: Samantha
item.dc:creator: Samantha
item.description:
Hey Sarah
We stayed at the Hezen over our honeymoon last year. I saw your post after they linked to it from their Facebook page.
What a magical, wonderful place it is. I daydream of it alll the time. It was soo nice to see your post and your photos. What I would do to be whisked away to this place once more.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Sarah

We stayed at the Hezen over our honeymoon last year. I saw your post after they linked to it from their Facebook page.

What a magical, wonderful place it is. I daydream of it alll the time. It was soo nice to see your post and your photos. What I would do to be whisked away to this place once more.
